game.description:
Wetlina '89 is a text adventure game, loosely following the events from Ucieczka z Z.S.T. The action takes place on a class trip to the Bieszczady Mountains in a small village in southeastern Poland called Wetlina. The objective of the adventure is to find items needed to write a letter home and a place to send it.

The screen is divided into inventory part and descriptive text part. When the player arrives at a new location he may read a short description of the place, including possible exits, items and present individuals. The player may carry up to four items and wear clothes. The command follows a verb noun pattern or single verb orders. The game dictionary shows up after typing 'sÅÃ³wka' command.
game.name: Wetlina '89
